content: other on the 2nd needle in the back i pick up 2 stitches left on one side make 5 stitches in the back then pick up the last 3 stitches on the other side of the ones i just made after picking up the 15 stitches and making the additional 5 you will have a total of 20 stitches on your needle tip when picking up the 5 stitches it often works for me to knit those stitches through the back loop to help eliminate any holes that happen when picking up stitches in this way knit one round then finish with 5 rounds of k2 p2 ribbing bind off weave all ends in and enjoy i am living out my dreams of fiber addiction and designing in albuquerque new mexico with my family miss audrey grace and an ever growing stash of yarn you can find me on ravelry and craftsy as mrsdonnelly please join me on my blog at claudiadonnellydesigns blogspot com i can be contacted by email at claudiadonnellydesigns@hotmail com copyrighted © 2021 claudia donnelly designs page 3
